title: Intercity
content: Here's something i made last year. I'm thinking about working on it again but also about dropping it on the trashcan. Any comments? ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020200839im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/26948.gif)
author: bertjan

comments.content:
I think this looks very cool. Definitly usable.   
In general I think the uppercase should follow the lowercase more when it is possible.   
I would make the bottom of the "E" like in "C", to get it more fluent.   
I would find another solution for the "S", it looks a bit affected...   
Try connecting the "K".   
You could try something like in "Z" on the "Y".   
And maybe make the whole thing a bit bolder...   
   
Cheers!

Thanks for your comments Tobias. Here's an update:   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020200839im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/27012.gif)

Thats right. Now the only thing i can think of to change is the tail of the Q, which doesnt fit the "grid". Maybe it could be a horizontal stroke, not connected. Perhaps also stick to just one type of W and S in lower- and uppercase..   
Don
